text: Mitri El Murr (Arabic:متري المر) (Tripoli November 7, 1880 – 1969) was the Archon Protopsaltis (first cantor) of the Greek Orthodox Church of Antioch, from 1912 until his death. He is known for his sophisticated compositions of Orthodox Church music. Category:1880 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Tripoli
title: Mitri el Murr
